page.title: 17OUR FAMILY WEEKEND 2
page.content:
On Saturday, July 13th, 1985, we went to the garden centre and bought 14 small plants to go in our front garden.Afterwards we bought a chemistry set and bought Bianca's friend a birthday present. We all went home and had our lunch and my dad had to go to work. Mark had his friend round so my mum and I went out to buy some badminton rackets. When we got home we had a barbecue and went indoors. On Sunday we did not do much. We did some cleaning and cooking and then we had our lunch. After lunch I cleaned the car and then we went to the beach to get some shells. When we came back my dad had half a bottle of champagne and we drank the rest.
Natasha
